# Draft:Image Warrant

----
| birth_place = Dunkwa-On-Offin, Ghana
| origin      = Ghana
| genre       = Afro Dancehall, Dancehall, Afrobeats

Image Warrant (born Halifa Kwakye; 11 March 1996) is a Ghanaian Afro Dancehall recording artist. He released his debut extended play (EP), Inner Echoes, on 14 November 2025.
Early life
Image Warrant was born in Dunkwa-On-Offin, Ghana.[Independent source needed]
Career
Image Warrant began his professional music career in October 2023.[Independent source needed]
Prior to his debut EP, he released four singles:
* "Thanks Giving" – 18 October 2023 [Independent source needed]
* "Sheegeh Wawa" – 30 April 2024 [Independent source needed]
* "Afawie" – 24 June 2024 [Independent source needed]
* "Cucumber" – 15 December 2024 [Independent source needed]
Inner Echoes EP (2025)
The EP Inner Echoes was released on 14 November 2025. The project includes production by Dollar Music, Dr Ray, and RooneyBeatz, and features a collaboration with Rashid Metal on the track "Amira".[Independent source needed]
Notable performances
* Maiden edition of AshantiFest (2023) [Independent source needed]
Discography
EPs
* Inner Echoes (14 November 2025)
Singles
* "Thanks Giving" (18 October 2023)
* "Sheegeh Wawa" (30 April 2024)
* "Afawie" (24 June 2024)
* "Cucumber" (15 December 2024)
